title: Custom I.T. Solutions in {{city_upper}}, FL
headline: Need something more advanced? Let's build a secure, personalized tech plan that fits you.
description: Advanced cybersecurity and custom technology consulting in {{city_upper}}. Get help with privacy planning, network design, smart home lockdowns, and more. Tailored to your needs.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Most prebuilt solutions prioritize convenience over security. Default configurations often leak data, leave ports open, or rely on third-party cloud services you cannot control.
If you are running a homelab, hosting private data, or integrating smart devices, your setup needs more than generic tools or default settings.
Advanced configurations allow you to self-host services, lock down hardware, and eliminate unnecessary external dependencies.

sections.heading: What We Do
items: Design secure, high-performance home or small office networks
Harden and isolate smart home ecosystems like Apple HomeKit, Google Nest, or Amazon Alexa
Set up private file sharing, encrypted backups, or self-hosted services
Implement VPNs, DNS over TLS, firewalls, and network segmentation
Repurpose hardware or build custom systems for privacy-focused use cases
Develop or configure software tools to match your privacy, security, or automation needs
Provide custom websites, web applications, or automation solutions tailored to your needs

sections.heading: How It Works
sections.paragraph: We start with a consultation to understand your goals, risks, and technical constraints. Then we build a custom configuration plan using vetted tools and best practices. You stay in full control of your data, and we document everything for long-term maintainability.
